title: Project Y, English Vo, Audio Bug, Tested it on 3 machines.
body: Project:Y legendery skin VO Audio is VERY LOW compared to any other champion including regiular Y. If you listhen to the first thing he sez after spawn, and then taunt or joke, you hear the difference right away. While moving the audio is alot lower, and when attacking , it sometimes gets up in volume , like it should be . i have submited 2 tickets about this, and wrote on the forum twice aswell. iTS A LEGENDERY SKIN! ITS FRIGGN BUGGED. God forbid i want to hear the danm VO.  if we could i would frigin boost the audio myself, but I cant without breaking the game. Its like this for atleast 5 months FFS. I am sorry if i seem agitated, but i am writingthis for the 4th time ,  its a minor bug for gods sake, please someoen just tweak some audio files..............

replies.body:
Hey Cendir! 

We totally get where you're coming from - especially since it's a legendary skin.

We're in the process of seeing what we can do to raise the volume. Since it's a legendary skin, there's a bit more to it than just moving a slider. We're hoping to have this completed soon, but it's certainly on our radar!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=MAxEdQzN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-19T18:15:17.816+0000)
>
> Hey Cendir! 
> 
> We totally get where you're coming from - especially since it's a legendary skin.
> 
> We're in the process of seeing what we can do to raise the volume. Since it's a legendary skin, there's a bit more to it than just moving a slider. We're hoping to have this completed soon, but it's certainly on our radar!

Think you can look into the alpha strike bug while you're fixing this?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LimM9a2ajE4
